eng: Slow slow slow

eng: [Verse 1]
Why is the sky so much more blue?
Why is the wind so perfect today?
Just pretend you don't know, pretend you don't hear
Shall we pretend to erase it and start talking about something else?
Shall I kiss you so I can't say anything?
[Chorus]
My eyes fill with tears, so I lift my head up
I smile lightly so they don't fall
Why are you doing this to me, what are you saying?
All the words I said today, go to the sky
The words I weren't able to say
I didn't know what to say as I cried
I like you, oppa, what should I do?
[Verse 2]
Was my new hairstyle not good enough?
Were the clothes I wore a disaster?
Still pretending like I don't know, like I don't remember
Should I act like nothing happened?
Should I just say "let's go out"?
[Chorus]
My eyes fill with tears, so I lift my head up
I smile lightly so they don't fall
Why are you doing this to me, what are you saying?
All the words I said today, go to the sky
The words I weren't able to say
I didn't know what to say as I cried
I like you, oppa, (whew) what should I do?
[Bridge]
Don't say such sad words while looking at me like this
Is it that I'm childish? or a bit slow?
I can't believe it
[Chorus]
Even though tears start to flow, I smile widely
I block your way and I just smile widely
Why am I being like this? Do I not have any shame?
I fold my pride up neatly and throw it to the sky
The words I weren't able to say
The words I might never be able to say again
I like you, oppa (Aigoo, one, two)
I'm in my dream
It's too beautiful, beautiful day
Make it a good day
Just don't make me cry
[Outro]
Such a good day

songs.title: The Night of the First Breakup

han: 온 종일을 네 옆에 있고 싶은데
rom: On jongireul ne yeope itgo sipeunde
eng: [Verse 1: IU & Lim Seul Ong]
Stop being out so late
Try not to drink so often
You don't listen to me like a 10-year-old child
I can't help but laugh
Who're you calling a child?
Really, I can only laugh
[Pre-Chorus: IU & Lim Seul Ong]
It's hard to say these things out loud
You don't know how it feels
I only want to say nice things to you
But you don't know that
Should I stop? Let's stop
[Chorus: IU, Lim Seul Ong & Both]
From one to ten
They're all words for you
But since you don't listen to me
It just becomes nagging to you
Let's stop, let's stop
I just don't have time to love
From the heart, not the mind
A story to tell
Even if you don't like it
Stories that I can't help but tell you
Let's stop, let's stop
I only hear your nagging
[Verse 2: IU & Lim Seul Ong]
Are you eating on time?
Are you staying away from girls?
I want to be beside you all day
That's how I feel
If I could keep you around in my pocket
I would be really happy
[Pre-Chorus: IU & Lim Seul Ong]
Where we can only be together
Our story
If anyone hears of it
A story they would laugh at
Should I stop? Let's stop
[Chorus: IU, Lim Seul Ong & Both]
From one to ten
They're all words for you
But since you don't listen to me
It just becomes nagging to you
Let's stop, let's stop
I just don't have time to love
From the heart, not the mind
A story to tell
Even if you don't like it
Stories that I can't help but tell you
Let's stop, let's stop
I only hear your nagging
[Bridge: IU, Lim Seul Ong & Both]
Even if you glare and try to scare me
Your face is just too cute for me
Are you going to keep this up? I can't stand it anymore
I really might get angry
[Chorus: IU, Lim Seul Ong & Both]
Had we given up on love
This story would not to be told
I always think of you
From the sound of my heart
Even if you're angry, even if you shout
Your nagging is just so sweet to me
Only because of our love
That such a story can be told
But since you don't listen to me
It just becomes nagging to you
Let's stop, let's stop
But trust my feelings
[Verse 1]
The rain is coming
Over my head, suddenly
Without notice, I get drenched
My memories start flowing
Followed by my tears
Just like a fool, as the way home
[Verse 2]
It's still a long way off
Being without an umbrella
It seems like I'll only catch a cold
But this road ahead of me
If it leads me back to you
Then getting drenched is worth it
[Chorus]
Oh rain drop
Oh rain drop
I'm lacking so much love
Oh rain drop
Oh rain drop
Love is like those drops of rain
Completely forgetting everything
As I'm drenched
Will I catch this painful cold?
[Verse 3]
Last summer
Under the sunlight, while being annoyed
Foolishly, I decided to turn away
But just like before, should you hold up an umbrella this time
If I could see you standing there again
I think it would be so wonderful
[Chorus]
Oh rain drop
Oh rain drop
I'm lacking so much love
Oh rain drop
Oh rain drop
Love is like those drops of rain
Completely forgetting everything
As I'm drenched
Will I catch this painful cold?
[Bridge]
Easily spoken words
Vulgar stories
You must have been very hurt
In your chest
Oh, if I'm still in there
If I am still there in your heart
Even with wet feet, I'd want to run to you
[Chorus]
Oh rain drop
Oh rain drop
I'm lacking so much love
Oh rain drop
Oh rain drop
Love is like those drops of rain
I completely forget
As I'm drenched
It hurts
Is it the cold?
[Post-Chorus]
So hurtful
Is it the cold?
My love
Why is it always like this?
